Recipe Price 25 sp
Ingredients 4 basic
Preparation DC 16 Cooking Lore, DC 18 Survival
Requirements Basic Kitchen
Favorite Meal You conserve the soup you eat, doubling the number of servings.

This hot, broth-based soup typically contains tubers, leeks, zesty spices, reagents, and if desired, the meat of livestock. Civic authorities commission batches of artisan soup for workers if a tricky job is on the agenda.

A whole pot of soup is typically able to be savored for the duration of a project, with a serving per workday, and a number of servings equal to the level of the soup.

After you eat a serving of soup, its effects last 24 hours or until you make your next daily preparations, whichever comes first. You gain a +1 item bonus to checks made to Craft or Repair, or increase any existing item bonus for these checks by 1. You also restore an additional 5 Hit Points per item bonus to items you successfully Repair during this time.

If you eat a serving of Artisan's Soup for each workday required to attempt a check to Craft, the item bonus from the soup can be applied to that check, too.
